language.entry: Use to empower the Antiquarian's team-targeted abilities. {colour_start|inventory_tooltip_gold_value}[Value: 500 Gold Each]{colour_end}
Use to empower the Antiquarian's enemy-targeted abilities. {colour_start|inventory_tooltip_gold_value}[Value: 500 Gold Each]{colour_end}
Use to empower the Antiquarian's abilities.
Produces powders from the personal stash.
The old girl doesn't play well with others, I'm afraid.
The pups are on edge. Best keep them separate.
-100%% ACC if no CORPSES +100%% DMG if 2+ CORPSES +100%% DMG if 3+ CORPSES
